description: The programme is designed to support national efforts aimed at reducing poverty levels so as to improve the quality of life of Nigerians through strategic, well coordinated pro-poor policy initiatives.

subproject.corporate outcome: Policies, strategies and partnerships established to enhance public-private sector collaboration and private sector and market development that benefit the poor and ensure that low-income households and small enterprises have access to a broad range of financial and legal services
subproject.description:
The programme was designed to support national efforts aimed at reducing poverty levels so as to improve the quality of life of Nigerians through strategic, well coordinated pro-poor policy initiatives.

 Major activities and results include: 

1. Training for improving service delivery for SME operators undertaken		

2. SME operators trained in management skills for enhanced standardization and productivity	

The project was in the sixth country programme cycle of UNDP Nigeria and has since been financially closed
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Enhance performance of MSMEs.

subproject.corporate outcome: Policies, strategies and partnerships established to enhance public-private sector collaboration and private sector and market development that benefit the poor and ensure that low-income households and small enterprises have access to a broad range of financial and legal services
subproject.description: In 2008, following the substantive revision of the project document on the Niger-Delta Job Creation ad Conflict Prevention Initiative,  also referred to as Youth Empowerment Programme (YEP). The is jointly funded by the Delta State Government, the Shell Petroleum Development Company of Nigeria (SPDC) and the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) and implemented by United Nations Project Services (UNOPS). The main objective of the project is to promote human security and sustainable development using youth empowerment, job creation and conflict prevention initiatives in the Niger Delta states of Nigeria
subproject.title: Niger-Delta Job Creation Prog.
